interact.description: This option changes whether another user can use the /has command on you
interact.label: Can Has

interact.description: This option changes whether another user can use the /diff command on you
interact.label: Can Diff

interact.description: This option changes whether another user can sell cards to you
interact.label: Can Sell

notify.description: This option changes whether you receive a DM when your auction receives an initial bid
notify.label: First Bid On Your Auctions

notify.description: This option changes whether you receive a DM when you are outbid on an auction
notify.label: Outbid On Auction Notification

notify.description: This option changes whether you receive a DM when your auction receives a new highest bid
notify.label: New Bid On Auction Notification

notify.description: This option changes whether you receive a DM when your auction ends
notify.label: Auction End Notification

notify.description: This option changes whether you receive a DM when a new bot announcement is made
notify.label: New Bot Announcements

notify.description: This option changes whether you receive a DM when your daily is ready
notify.label: Daily Ready Notifications

notify.description: This option changes whether you receive a DM when you can vote for the bot
notify.label: Vote Ready Notifications

notify.description: This option changes whether you receive a DM when a collection is completed or completion is lost
notify.label: Collection Completion Status Notifications

notify.description: This option changes whether you receive a DM when an effect expires or comes off cooldown
notify.label: Effect Expires Or Comes Off Cooldown
